name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior .NET Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, and **Microsoft Azure SQL Database**, and skilled in frontend development utilizing **ReactJS** and backend technologies. Familiar with **Docker** and **Kubernetes (K8s)** for containerization and orchestration, as well as implementing CI/CD pipelines in cloud environments.
Expert in leveraging **Azure AI services** for data-driven decision-making, while also applying **TypeScript** to enhance application scalability and maintainability. Experienced in managing Agile development processes using **SCRUM** methodologies. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms, supporting predictive analytics, and real-time processing. Well-versed in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Noteworthy experience in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** while aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
